hero.title: Embark on a Medieval Adventure
hero.subtitle: Enter The Lion's Lands, a medieval festival where every visitor becomes a hero and every step advances the adventure.

intro.title: The Kingdom Awaits
intro.text_1: Step into a world where history breathes and legends come alive. Our kingdom offers more than just events; it offers a passage through time.
intro.text_2: From the grandest tournaments to the quietest village gatherings, every moment is crafted to immerse you in the rich tapestry of our medieval heritage.

features.title: Explore the Medieval Era
features.subtitle: Dive into history with our comprehensive features

paragraphs.1: Welcome to The Lion's Lands, a unique medieval event inspired by live-action role-playing. Designed to offer total immersion, the festival plunges you into a world of quests, legendary creatures, and ancestral craftsmanship.
paragraphs.2: Organized around a vast thematic village, each zone invites you to meet passionate artisans, entertainers, innkeepers, and creators who bring an authentic universe to life.
paragraphs.3: Thanks to an enriched interactive experience — quests via QR codes, workshop bookings, click & collect, quizzes, and creation galleries — every visitor becomes an actor in their own adventure.
paragraphs.4: The dedicated app allows you to explore, learn, discover, and progress throughout the journey to the castle, where the story reaches its climax.
paragraphs.5: The Lion's Lands is a place where immersion meets technology, where heritage inspires play, and where every visit writes a new legend.
